casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Michael Allen BAILEY, Petitioner No. 419 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. April 10, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 10th day of April, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, the Application for Relief, and the Motion to Vacate Judgment of Sentence are DENIED.
